about_the_game:
Rocket Rumble combines the best parts of party racing games and combines them with fast paced action brawling games and roguelike adventures! Join a charming cast of rocket powered animal racers as they bash, smash and race their way to victory! Collect points for crossing checkpoints and dealing damage while trying to knock your rivals off the track!

The demo features:
  • procedurally generated tracks (trillions of combinations means you'll never have the same race twice)
  • 4 fun animal characters
  • Tons of customization items (hats, glasses, badges, patterns and more!)

Rocket Rumble combines the best parts of party racing games and combines them with fast paced action brawling games and roguelike adventures! Join a charming cast of rocket powered animal racers as they bash, smash and race their way to victory! The demo features:

name: Rocket Rumble Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 Series
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9 Series or similar
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I7 Series
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 10 Series or similar
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Rocket Rumble is a racing brawler for up to 4 players! Customize your animals and smash, bash and race your way through procedurally generated sci-fi worlds!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Turkish, Ukrainian
